detail: Watch rest videos and take notes clearly on the module .
Practice the topics of current module and more by reading articles and watching videos .
Join support session for fixing issues .
Go to facebook group to ask confusing questions or help others to get more confidence .
Make a  similar project or do the same project one more time .
Attend Live Conceptual Session For Ultimate Rivision And Get Ready For New Topics .
Watch New Module Videos And Try To Understand As Much As Possible .
